conversations_v0.answer: Subfigure (b) shows a graph with 'Energy/K' on the vertical axis and 'Pump param. Ωt/2π' on the horizontal axis. This suggests that it is showing the relationship between the energy levels of the system and the pump parameter. Therefore, the correct answer is B.
